title: Esquire Magazine UK
content:
Does anyone know which is the typography used in esquire magazine (UK version) for titles and some head of sections (sans serif).

Thanks.  
Carolina

 [‹ (x) Anniversary Sale script and condensed serif - various, Bodoni {Stephen, Simon H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007182819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38790 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with this italic? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007182819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38808 "Go to next forum topic")
author: carolinapires

comments.content:
It is referred to as “Esquire07” in this review of the redesign, but no designer/studio is credited.

[http://magculture.com/blog/?p=1263#more-1263](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007182819/http:/magculture.com/blog/?p=1263#more-1263 "http://magculture.com/blog/?p=1263#more-1263")
The titling typeface is by B&P, [here’s their news entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007182819/http:/bpfoundry.com/bp/news/news.htm?news_id=22&x=123&y=123)
